item.title: Fizzbuzz
item.author: Manuel Alfaro
item.description: FizzBuzz The FizzBuzz problem is a classic test given in coding interviews. The task is simple: print integers 1 to N. For example we can find one example in HackerRank with the next description: Write a short program that prints each number from 1 to 100 on a new line. For each multiple of 3, print “Fizz” instead of the number. For each multiple of 5, print “Buzz” instead of the number.
